# The `GCNSchedStrategy` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This is a minimal scheduler strategy.

The main difference between this and the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericscheduler">GenericScheduler</a> is that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy">GCNSchedStrategy</a> uses different heuristics to determine excess/critical pressure sets.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnschedstrategy-h">GCNSchedStrategy.h</a>.

### pickNode() {#af3f3a45f145bc8538e160bc3177ffc8f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SUnit &#42; GCNSchedStrategy::pickNode (bool &amp; IsTopNode)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Pick the next node to schedule, or return NULL.

Set IsTopNode to true to schedule the node at the top of the unscheduled region. Otherwise it will be scheduled at the bottom.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnschedstrategy-h/#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnschedstrategy-h">GCNSchedStrategy.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnschedstrategy-cpp/#l00445">445</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/gcnschedstrategy-cpp">GCNSchedStrategy.cpp</a>.
